artist: Circle of Federico Zuccaro; Circle of Taddeo Zuccaro; Formerly attributed to Francesco Salviati or his circle
inscription:
Inscription

LLC, in pencil: [Gansby (?)]; LRC, in black ink: [A Del Magno]; on back, in black ink: [illegible] Beccafumi

On old mat, in graphite, in Moir's hand: [Francesco Salviati or his circle, perhaps Ponsio Jacquis, or Jacquio Ponce]
life_date: Circle of Federico Zuccaro, Italian, c. 1541–1609; Circle of Taddeo Zuccaro, Italian, 1529–1566; Formerly attributed to Francesco Salviati or his circle, Italian (Florence), 1510–1563
medium: Pen and brown ink and brush and brown wash
provenance: Private collection, United States; sale, Christie's, London, July 7, 1987, no. 113, for £850, to Moir; Alfred Moir, Santa Barbara (1987-d. 2010; bequeathed to MIA)
title: Heroism of Marcus Curtius
